trial.q: Do you offer a free trial?
trial.a: Yes — you can start with a free trial and upgrade when you’re ready.

cancel.a: Yes. Cancel whenever you want; your plan stays active until the end of the billing period.

upgrade.a: Absolutely. Upgrade or downgrade anytime. Billing changes apply immediately or at the next billing cycle depending on your selection.

storageBandwidth.q: How do storage and video bandwidth work?
storageBandwidth.a: Storage is for your uploaded files. Video bandwidth is the amount of video data streamed to members each month.

customDomain.a: Yes on Growth and above. Connect your own domain in a few clicks.

payments.a: Payments are unlocked so you can sell products and collect revenue through the platform.

refunds.a: If something isn’t right, contact support and we’ll help. Refund eligibility depends on your plan and payment provider terms.

support.q: What kind of support do I get?
support.a: Starter includes standard support. Growth includes priority support. Scale includes dedicated support.
